Hi! I am a master’s student in the Department of Economics at Istanbul Technical University, Turkey.




Causal Inference & Econometrics
Labor Economics
Economics of Migration
Development Economics





Fluent: R & R Markdown, Stata, \(\LaTeX\) & TikZ, git, Regular Expressions, Microsoft Office
Familiar: Python, Quarto, C++(for Rcpp), Bash, Adobe Products

title: Research Experience
text:
Research Assistant at Department of Economics  (03/2021 - Present)  Istanbul Technical University
Research Assistant to Assoc. Prof. Aysegul Kayaoglu  (07/2020 - Present)  Istanbul Technical University
Field Research Assistant  (11/2020 - 01/2021)   Kayaoglu, A. (2021), A Youth Centered Participatory Assessment in Turkey: Understanding Refugee and Host Community Youth’s Perceptions, Challenges and Needs. London, Save the Children International.
Data Coding Team  (02/2020 - 03/2020)   Kayaoglu, A. (2021), A Gender-Sensitive Study on Urban Child Labor in Istanbul. London, Save the Children International.
Field Translator (English to Turkish, Turkish to English)  (01/2020 - 02/2020)   Chang, C. A. (2021). The economically rich refugees: A case study of the business operations of Istanbul-based Syrian refugee businesspeople. International Migration.
